Detailed Description

Bone-animated mesh class.

This class implements skeletal animated meshes that can be read from a .k3d file. Some of its members are: the number of keys in all animations, the names of the animations, the total number of bones,the names of each bone, the root bone in the skeleton hierarchy and an array of vertex weights. The class also features methods for building the mesh from the current animation and skeleton state, blending between animations and skeleton states, drawing the skeleton for debug purposes and loading and saving .k3d files.
